website_summaries.verdict: Although it only appeared in one Jurassic Park film, this Funko Pop! is loaded with the deceptive predatory charm that made Dilophosaurus a fan-favorite dinosaur.
pros: Cute and creepy Dilophosaurus sports an impressively movie-accurate paint job
Tail position makes it easy to stand upright
cons: 6 out of 7 Dilophosaurus feature a colorful frill
the 7th is a rare version that simply doesn’t

customer_reviews.title: I dropped the box and when I picked it up ...
customer_reviews.text: I dropped the box and when I picked it up it tried to spit acid on me. Thanks to Funko packaging I can still see.
customer_reviews.author: Bskip

customer_reviews.title: Love it! FRILLS NOT REMOVABLE
customer_reviews.text: I misunderstood and thought the frills were removable. THEY ARE NOT! THAT’S JUST AN ALTERNATE VERSION YOU CAN GET! After a few minutes of trying to remove the frills and finding they were quite securely attached, I reread the description and found that out. Besides that, wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Love the Jurassic Park Funkos
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my collection! Gotta have the Jurassic Park Funkos! Funko box bent up a little. 😒 Packager Mike 4360, did great before, not so much this time.
customer_reviews.author: CELENA  P

customer_reviews.title: The best pop figs
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't like the pop figs. They always seem like they're too much for something that seems so cheap. Their paint jobs are almost always terrible and they always have these terrible lines all over them. However, I actually love the dinosaurs from Jurassic Park. They're extremely adorable looking, but even though I feel they're more worth the price they still have their flaws. They have some really bad paint jobs that I'm not too much of a big fan of and you can see multiple spots where the glue was coming out of it but other than that I think these are fantastic little figures! (well just a dinosaur ones)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: There's only 3 Funko series I wanted a pop from, not into the humanoids, this Jurassic Park line is adorable though! And dilophosaurus is my favorite, first off the paint varies alot, I'm happy I got out with a frill and good paint, could be better but I'm happy with it (the rathalos funko I got had the best paint). Side note I like that the Chase has no frill, like the real life dinosaur. My dilophosaurus left arm is slightly out of place, doesn't bother me though.
customer_reviews.author: DARTH🐺SCRUFF

customer_reviews.title: The Box Was a Mess (ALSO: Don't throw away the stand!!!)
customer_reviews.text: The actual figure was excellent. Unfortunately, the box it came in was pretty much destroyed in transit. So much for collectible quality. MAJOR UPDATE: Check the box for the clear plastic stand under the figure's feet! I nearly threw mine away by accident.
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Chaput

customer_reviews.title: It’s a cute little figure
customer_reviews.text: I love Jurassic Park and I don’t normally collect these, but I had to have it, I already had the one with frills so I was hoping to get the one without, unfortunately I did not. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Evans

customer_reviews.title: These are a great addition to my collection
customer_reviews.text: My husband just absolutely loves loves loves Jurassic Park. We bought all of the Funko Pops for them when they came out. They were packaged very well and the boxes were not damaged at all. We take ours out of the boxes and display them, although I know a lot of people keep them in the original boxes. These are a great addition to my collection. They sit front and center on my bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brown

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed box
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was great, but the box was completely crushedeven though the shipping box was fine. I needed it for a Christmas present so I didn't have time to exchange it, but I'm pretty disappointed they decided to send this to me looking the way it did.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you don't toss the base
customer_reviews.text: The paint job is a little bit rough, but all in all it's a fairly nice POP figure of everyone's favorite prehistoric dog. Doesn't stand well on its own though, so make sure you take the plastic base out of the box if you take it out of the box at all.
customer_reviews.author: Justyn

customer_reviews.title: For Father's Day I surprised him with this gift and he was shocked with happiness. He couldn't believe it
customer_reviews.text: So me and my dad are a huge fans of the Jurassic Park movies since forever. For Father's Day I surprised him with this gift and he was shocked with happiness. He couldn't believe it, lol. It looks great on his work desk. The Dilophosaurus came in perfect condition along with the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Right box, wrong dinosaur. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 550, and received 549. I am not happy. My son is autistic, so receiving the wrong one has thrown a huge hitch in my day. It's a good product but the wrong one. Right box, wrong dinosaur. It showed the one with frills as the one I purchased. They put the wrong one in this box.
customer_reviews.author: Joran Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The details... Wow...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most detailed Funko pop I've every scene. The texture and the paint job are really impressive. It's almost a little creepy to have this tiny realistic looking dino on my desk. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TXODork

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: It was an awesome Pop figure, but the box has sticker marks on it from price stickers I assume and it was a little crushed in (not sure if that’s shipping or prior to). Other than that, it’s just as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smashed as usual.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived smashed but that was expected coming from amazon, Would not recommend for in box collectors. Perfect to sit next to my Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Guinealove2005

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Didnt get the rare but still super pleased! If anyone gets the one with closed frills let a girl know. Im down to trade or buy for a resonable price. I absolutely love jurassic park and plan to snag em all if I can.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great price! I bought this item for my son ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I bought this item for my son after going to Universal Studios and seeing the same thing for $20!
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Damaged by Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box was perfect. Collectible item itself was smashed. Unacceptable. Item sold direct from Amazon Services. Exchanging.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Guru

customer_reviews.title: Hold onto your butts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a decoration on the interior of my Jeep wrangler. Fits perfectly on the dash, but the paint is not done very well. There are splatters and miscoloring on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm... No Frill
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn't come with frill, think this is the first Funko Pop I was disappointed in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: My son has wanted this pop for a long time, he loves the Dilophosaurus. However, when it came it did not have the fans on the side of the face as in the picture. He was very disappointed as he was expecting the same one as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!!
customer_reviews.text: Recently received my purchase of this pop Dino at a great price but I was sad to see that it did not have the neck frill that I was hoping for. I got the special edition one without the neck frill. The product came to me nice and well packaged. No damage upon shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mario m.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for the movie fans
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a fan of the Jurassic World series. So cool great gift.
customer_reviews.author: angela brakke

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointing quality - huge gaps in the seams, glue visible everywhere and a monkey paint job. I was kinda expecting it to be more similar to the photo shown - it is nothing like it. It looks like some knock off. It's still cute, but not close to what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I expected the Dilophosaurus to have the frills on its head. It did not. So disappointing to my dino loving nephew.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lim

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can buy Chase Pops on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: So excited to finally receive it! I love that I can buy Chase Pops on Amazon. His box was in perfect condition, and since I collect Funko! Pops, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri West

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up to Funko!
customer_reviews.text: this is what my son pits against T-Rex to fight! he has fun with them! thats cool that they also come with those circle plastic stands that you attach their left foot to it to stay up straight just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Odds are low for chase.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality pop. This is the third one I bought and all 3 are the finned ones. Was hoping for a chase version. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Miner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in the packaging. I want to give this as a gift and it looks tossed around. It even looks like it’s been opened already. Buyer needs to say “used” item and cheapen the price. 👎
customer_reviews.author: Serena Tongson

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Painted, but Passable
customer_reviews.text: A figure that is well-enough, but seriously has some painting issues. I'm no Funko collector, but I imagine it'd be a bit irritating to get one with a paintjob as bad as the Jurassic World Hasbro toys, particularly on the teeth. Decent sculpt, not perfect, but it works. Good for a casual buyer or repainters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful what you buy
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box arrived fine, product came damaged. I can’t return it or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Breese

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on the box was a little scratchy but other then that it was a solid addition to the collection
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as pictured item
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the one pictured--with the frill and received the chase version. Not super thrilled with this purchase unfortunately 😕
customer_reviews.author: rabber

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! I love it and it looks great with my Jurassic Park collection.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great and has nice detail
customer_reviews.text: This is so great, it's my favorite dinosaur in Jurassic Park.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rankin

customer_reviews.title: I loved this pop figure
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pop figure!!! I got it for my dad because he said he liked a Jurassic Park t rex pop figure when I got an add in the mail from hot topic. So I thought I would get him one and it scared my dad half to death because I put it on his dresser when he wasn t looking!!!! It was hilarious!!!! So I love it!!! Nothing to complain about and it came here super fast too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lambie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: I like on pic and now I love on my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Bull1154

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two and got one of each
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two hoping I would at least get one of the chase version since they are more rare and I already had the other one. Ended up getting one of each so I’m very happy I got at least one.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Lares

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy, son loved it
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say except it’s a funko, cool figure though.
customer_reviews.author: Miamizx

customer_reviews.title: Love him!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for any Jurassic Park fan. I'm happy I got the one with the frills.
customer_reviews.author: Typati

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous funko and pretty cool. Product and product box came undamaged so that's always fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this Jurassic park dinosaurs - the chase version doesn't quite looks as good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reed

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my 6 year old nephew. He LOVED it.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these
customer_reviews.text: The kids were quiet got an hour Give them funky pops and you can get stinky!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Pedigo

customer_reviews.title: Five Star review...Amazon.com for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Love this POP! and was able to receive the Chase version!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pop was in good condition but the box was crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Came in great condition
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it came in great condition and it adds to my growing collection
customer_reviews.author: jeanne klein

customer_reviews.title: which is great since I plan on keeping it in the box
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged well and the box arrived undamaged, which is great since I plan on keeping it in the box. It's not a chase edition, but I prefer this one anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a JP fanatic who loved getting the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl40

customer_reviews.title: love it! I wish it was a bobble head ...
customer_reviews.text: Used as a dash ornament in my car, love it! I wish it was a bobble head though. Would recommend for the jp lover in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Gochenour

customer_reviews.title: Great condition
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised on how well this was packaged and the box was in excellent condition. The recipient of this gift was very happ.
customer_reviews.author: Carley Guertin

customer_reviews.title: Chase Edition is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nice collectible I got the chase Edition and it is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item. I was a little discouraged to see that the box of the item itself was slightly damaged
customer_reviews.author: Primus

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping to get the one with frill
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted the dilophosaurus with the frill, so I was hoping to receive that one, but received the chase version instead. Other than that the toy looks good and the box was perfectly in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Madina Shoaib

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Package came a little bang up but overall good condition. Exactly as the picture
customer_reviews.author: melany

customer_reviews.title: Not what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Dilophosaurus, but that is NOT what was in the Funko box. The item had been swapped out for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Stand broke off
customer_reviews.text: The stand broke off three days after he unwrapped it for Christmas. Now it won’t stand up.
customer_reviews.author: RLD

customer_reviews.title: looks amazing!! Perfect match for my Jurassic funko collection
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge Jurassic park fan, along with funko pops it's crazy! So when I ordered this you can imagine how nerdy I became. This package came fast and on time, opened it and no dents no issues, looks amazing!! Perfect match for my Jurassic funko collection.
customer_reviews.author: Arius Alexander King

customer_reviews.title: Defective item with no option to return
customer_reviews.text: The items head was not glued on properly. Making his head lopsided. There is no option to return even though it is defective
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Funko Pop EVER
customer_reviews.text: She came in awesome condition, the box a little flimsy but I'm so happy I got the frilled version! She's sitting happily on my TV stand :)
customer_reviews.author: shannon canter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it looks good! but smaller than I thought but its a pop figure
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: Great Funko, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these. Both have the frills. I would have loved to get one of each, of course! I'm not sure why folks are complaining because the listing was clear that styles may vary. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the colors are really elementary. They're not blended and "natural" looking. More of paint by number feel, especially on the frill (as folks call it) Super cute though and well worth the price, under $10!
customer_reviews.author: DesertBloom

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged but the funko pop wasn’t. Box had rips and dents.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cincotta

customer_reviews.title: I got the Chase!
customer_reviews.text: Box came in excellent condition! It was bubble wrapped twice! Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: John Elliott

customer_reviews.title: The front plastic part of the case has a big ...
customer_reviews.text: The front plastic part of the case has a big dent in it. Its right infront of his nose. Sure upset about the box damage.
customer_reviews.author: rachel dimercurio

customer_reviews.title: Funko equals Life
customer_reviews.text: I love the Pop! line, but the quality in color and paint could 've better. Still a fan though, love Jurassic Park.
customer_reviews.author: William J Kittinger

customer_reviews.title: ... got the Limited Edition Chase one so I was pleased and I'm going to buy from them again and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the Limited Edition Chase one so I was pleased and I'm going to buy from them again and hopefully get the regular one with the frills out.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Forney

customer_reviews.title: The box came in bent and teared
customer_reviews.text: The box was destroyed and if you are a Funko collecter like me you wouldn’t like the box condition
customer_reviews.author: Collin V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this POP! the black around the eyes is Rad.
customer_reviews.author: robert rusticus

customer_reviews.title: Was a beautiful collectible. My favorite dinosaur from the film
customer_reviews.text: Was a beautiful collectible. My favorite dinosaur from the film. Ordered two, but the packaging on one was busted up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Squirl

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: boxes were dented and smashed did not like the way they came
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... them in the mail today (bought 3) but was disappointed about not getting the chase edition
customer_reviews.text: I got them in the mail today (bought 3) but was disappointed about not getting the chase edition. But they are still really cute! Anyone want to trade?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Box was smashed on both ends.. Hard to make it a collectible when the box is delapidated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the box came in perfect condition, very happy to add to my collection
customer_reviews.text: Came when it said it would, and the box came in perfect condition, very happy to add to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. The figure as a whole is just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: These are great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the the day after I ordered them, fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Vega-Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy online, you don't know what you'll get
customer_reviews.text: Really annoying that it wasn't originally clear that there was two versions. I got the chase and not the frilled version (which I wanted).
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Bad paint
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got the frilled version but the paint is rather bad. Thick dark black around the eyes really bothers me. Otherwise he's fine, it isn't like I expect super high quality from Pop or anything. Like that he comes with a clear base so isn't constantly falling over
customer_reviews.author: Nnyraptor

customer_reviews.title: ... received a chase version without the frills and I’m super disappointed. Not only that
customer_reviews.text: I received a chase version without the frills and I’m super disappointed. Not only that, but the box is damaged so I can’t resell it for a good price. Thinking of maybe returning it
customer_reviews.author: cakes

customer_reviews.title: Watch out, Nedry, because this animal is not extinct yet!
customer_reviews.text: There is a version of this figure without the frill, but if you liked the one in Jurassic Park with the frill, then get this Pop Vinyl. Overall, the color is neat, and I like that they come on a plastic base.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth N.

customer_reviews.title: Jurassic Park Pops are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I was crossing my fingers for another chase, but sadly no. I was able to make the extra a custom metallic gold Dilophosaurus and it came out looking really nice! Best Pop Figures, hands down! Hoping Funko will make more future JP & JW Funkos.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: No chase...
customer_reviews.text: Description said 1 in every 6 could be a chase and after purchasing 6 I did not recieve any chases. Some boxes arrived damaged as well. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Peree Curry

customer_reviews.title: Careful: Two Options
customer_reviews.text: I was sad it didn't have the frill like the picture shows. However, she's still cute and it was delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: K Ack

customer_reviews.title: the dino I expected to get was not the one ...
customer_reviews.text: the dino I expected to get was not the one in the picture, it had no frill and I was very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Colecchi

customer_reviews.title: Not what was pictured
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Pop Funko's. I hate the fact the picture I was shown when ordering this was the Dilophosaurus with his hood spread wide open. So that is what I assumed I would be getting. Instead I received a different style. I was not very happy about that since I was after the one I thought I was purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Patches

customer_reviews.title: Frills not guaranteed.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy because I thought I was ordering the one in the picture (“frills” out) and it wasn’t clear enough when ordering that it could be either. Mine arrived without the “frills” (“chase” version) and really should play a sad trombone as you unbox it. Funko, please make this clearer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Yay for Chase!
customer_reviews.text: Got this one for my daughter, who is a huge Jurassic Park fan, and I was thrilled to get the Chase model. Now she has both kinds of Dilophosaurus and the Nedry with spit on his face. She was so excited when she opened the box and saw them <3
customer_reviews.author: Anarch

customer_reviews.title: Cool Toy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved this toy. It was used as a cake topper. This one in particular is very colorful dino.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Sullivan

product_meta.title: Funko Pop! Movies: Jurassic Park - Dilophosaurus (Styles May Vary) Collectible Figure
product_meta.description: Size:StandardFrom Jurassic park, Dilophosaurus (styles may vary), as a stylized pop vinyl from Funko! figure stands 3 3/4 inches and comes in a window display box. Check out the other Jurassic park figures from Funko! collect them all!
feature_bullets: From Jurassic park, dilophosaurus (styles may vary), as a stylized pop vinyl from Funko!
Stylized collectable stands 3 ¾ inches tall, perfect for any Jurassic park fan!
Collect and display all Jurassic park pop! Vinyls!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars829 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
